 533      @staticmethod 

 534 -    def is_image(value): 

 535          """ 
 536          Tries to check if the filename provided references to an image 
 537   
 538          Checking is based on filename extension. Currently recognized: 
 539             gif, png, jp(e)g, bmp 
 540   
 541          :param value: filename 
 542          """ 
 543
